'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. It is located on a desert island at the southwestern extreme of the Deadfire, at the coordinates 38° 37' S 31° 21' E.

==Background==
Desert and "home" of [[Dorudugan]], the Hellfire Colossus. He is one of the four [[Mega Boss Battles|mega bosses]].
